description: Study Permit. Note: SDS Program Discontinued (Nov 2024). All applications are now Standard.

meta.passport_validity: Must be valid for the duration of the study program
meta.min_funds_requirement:
**New Requirement:**

* **Living Expenses:** **CAD 20,635** (Single Applicant)
* **Tuition:** 1st Year Paid in full.
* **Travel:** ~CAD 2,000.
* **Total Liquid Proof:** Approx **₹25 Lakhs+** recommended.

documents.title: Valid Passport
documents.description: Scanned copies of all pages. Validity should cover the entire course duration to avoid permit renewal issues.

documents.title: Letter of Acceptance (LOA)
documents.description: Official letter from a Designated Learning Institution (DLI). Must state the program start/end dates and tuition fees.

documents.title: Provincial Attestation Letter (PAL)
documents.description: **Mandatory:** Required for most undergraduate students. Master's/PhD students will also require it starting 2025-26.

documents.title: GIC Certificate (Recommended)
documents.description: Purchase a GIC of CAD 20,635 from a Canadian bank to demonstrate financial stability.

documents.title: Upfront Medical Sheet (e-Medical)
documents.description: Information Sheet from a Panel Physician. Doing this *before* applying (Upfront) saves 3-4 weeks of processing time.

documents.title: Additional Financials
documents.description:
1. **Tuition Receipt:** Proof of 1st year payment.
2. **Bank Statements:** Last 4 months (Liquid funds).
3. **Sponsorship Affidavit:** If parents are funding.

documents.title: Statement of Purpose (SOP)
documents.description: Critical for approval. Must explain: Why Canada? Why this course? Why not study in India? (Max 2 pages).

steps_flow.title: Admission & PAL
steps_flow.description: Apply to a DLI. Once accepted, the university must apply for your **PAL** (Provincial Attestation Letter).

steps_flow.title: Financial Setup (GIC + Tuition)
steps_flow.description: Pay 1 Year Tuition and buy a GIC of CAD 20,635.

steps_flow.title: Upfront Medical Exam
steps_flow.description: Book an appointment with an **IRCC Panel Physician** in India.

steps_flow.title: IRCC Portal Application
steps_flow.description:
Create an account on the IRCC Secure Portal.
* **Upload:** PAL + LOA + GIC + Medical + Passport.
* **Pay:** CAD 150 (Visa) + CAD 85 (Biometrics).

steps_flow.title: Biometrics & Wait
steps_flow.description: Receive the Biometric Instruction Letter (BIL). Book VFS appointment. Wait for Passport Request (PPR).

application_platforms.name: University Portals
application_platforms.description: Applications are submitted directly to each university's online portal.
